description: Detects usage of Dsacls to grant over permissive permissions
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate administrators granting over permissive permissions to users
name: Potentially Over Permissive Permissions Granted Using Dsacls.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\dsacls.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"DSACLS.EXE")) AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \/G\ *" AND process.command_line.text:("*GR*" OR "*GE*" OR "*GW*" OR "*GA*" OR "*WP*" OR "*WD*"))
